name: Alexandra Siega
bio: Data scientist, web developer, civic tech + dog enthusiast

previous.name: Upperline School of Code
previous.title: Intro to Software Engineering Instructor/Tutor
previous.description: Co-taught Intro to Software Engineering immersive bootcamp courses for high school students. Introduced students to full-stack web programming -- including Ruby fundamentals, HTML/CSS, Bootstrap/Materialize, and the Sinatra framework -- to build fully-fledged web applications in two weeks. As a tutor, created individualized learning materials and delivered one-on-one lessons in JavaScript and HTML/CSS.

previous.name: US Department of Defense
previous.title: Analytic Product Lead/Language Analyst
previous.description: Designed, developed, and deployed cutting-edge tools and tradecraft to modernize analysis practices in support of U.S. foreign policy missions stateside and overseas. Managed customer and developer needs; created and delivered training events and materials across diverse teams. In addition to analytic development duties, analyzed large data sets and published reports on key issues for policy makers.
